history.proof: intros A p T r H. destruct H as [H_dom H_incr]. apply chain_ind. - intros x T' r' H'. apply chain_single, H'. - intros x y T' r' H1 H2 H3. sfirstorder depth: 3use: chain_def_ok, chain_concat_m, chain_incr, chain_concat_s. - intros. sfirstorder depth: 3use: chain_def_ok, chain_concat_m, chain_incr, chain_concat_s. - srun best use: pre_domok_incr_chain_2 unfold: pre_domok_incr_chain_def.

ctx: intros A p T r H.
intros x y T' r' H1 H2 H3.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

ctx: intros A p T r H.
intros x y T' r' H1 H2 H3.
exceptions.tactic: intros x y z p' T' r' H1 H2 H3 H4.

original: intros A p T r H. destruct H as [H_dom H_incr]. apply chain_ind. - intros x T' r' H'. apply chain_single, H'. - intros x y T' r' H1 H2 H3. apply chain_concat_s, H1, H2, H3. - intros x y z p' T' r' H1 H2 H3 H4. apply chain_concat_m, H1, H2, H4. apply chain_def_ok, H_dom. apply chain_incr, H_incr.
